title: Cap Streamers, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, Valencienne ground
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description:
Cap streamers of Binche lace in an asymmetric, open floral pattern framed by narrow garlands that terminate in abbreviated scrolls. 
Fond: maille carrée. Modes: fond de neige, portes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cap Streamers, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, Valencienne ground. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-122-a,b.
